Texts.Chs: 我发现一群人类在一个洞穴里，不是那种天然的洞穴，而是由原始结构扩建而成的军事掩体。我进去把发生的事告诉他们，希望他们能帮到我，但他们实在太吝啬了。最后我借了他们飞船的某个零件，希望他们能安全起飞。
Texts.Eng: I found a group of humans in a hole in the ground. Not the creepy kind of hole, some kind of military bunker. I thought I'd drop in, regale them with tales of some of my adventures, but no, they were having none of it. Wouldn't even let me in. Shocking hospitality! In the end I borrowed one of their spaceships for spare parts, and left them to it.

Texts.Chs:
我，Hiraki_Corale，鲛人族冒险家。
我的飞船迫降于这个星球，当时我正在躲避猿族，所以最佳方法就是将他们引诱到一个小行星带，当然结果是非常有效的！不过正因为如此，我才会被迫呆在这儿。
Texts.Eng:
by Hiraki Corale, Hylotl adventurer
My ship crash-landed on a planet. I may have been fleeing a certain simian species at the time, and decided the best course of action was to lure them into an asteroid field. It worked! Of course, I have no experience navigating through asteroid fields so here I am.
